Name: Backup Battery Charge
Desc:
Once Battery Charge reaches 240, recover 1 Backup Battery Charge every 18 minutes. You can have up to 2,400 Backup Battery Charge.
Consume Backup Battery Charge to gain an equal amount of Battery Charge.
Desc2:
Battery Charge stored in a backup battery, ready for use whenever needed.
If Ether technology can be applied to produce batteries, their efficiency might be further improved. Luckily, this backup battery has a large capacity, turning Battery Charge into a valuable long-term asset.
